string.value: #b#p9010010##k says she's prepared a gift for you in celebration of the new semester...
#b#p9010010##k said she's preparing a gift for you. Are you excited?
You received #b#t2310000##k as a gift. This will come in handy when you're in the Free Market.
We gotten so many newcomers in the school Maple World this semester. Isn't that great?
I'm so happy to see all the cute little rookies. I've prepared some gifts for them... Would you like one too? Let me go pick one out for you.
Hm... I guess you aren't too happy about the newcomers crowding into your space?
Tada! The gift I prepared for you is a #b#t2310000##k that allows you to search for items sold at the Free Market. It's for you.

You can find my gift in the #eUse (Hotkey I) window#n, and the item is good for #r7 days#k. Oh, and I'll be giving away gifts for a couple of Thursdays during the month of March, so come find me when you want. But I won't be able to give you anything new if you don't use the gift I gave you just now.
